Instance.description: The situation to run a yoga class in Relaxation Center.

Tunable.name: _class_member_job
Tunable.description: The situation job for class members.

TunableList.name: class_pose_map
TunableList.description: The static map to mapping yoga pose state to the certain pose enum. Put it here instead of in the module tuning is for pack safe reason. This should only be tuned on prototype, and not suggesting to change/override in tuning instance unless you have very strong reason.

TunableVariant.name: pose_content
TunableVariant.description: The variant of different class poses.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: affordances
TunableList.description: The Sim must have started either any affordance in this list or an interaction matching one of the tags in this tunable's Tags field.

TunableList.name: tags
TunableList.description: The Sim must have run either an interaction matching one of these Tags or an affordance from the list of Affordances in this tunable.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableTuple.name: member_delay_time
TunableTuple.description: The delay between when the instructor does a pose and when a class member copies that pose.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: miss_interaction_time_delay
Tunable.description: The delay if the interaction we are monitoring to finish this state is missing, we will move on.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableTuple.name: interaction_of_interest
TunableTuple.description: The interaction that when run will cause GPE defined behavior to run.

TunableList.name: class_pose_states
TunableList.description: The sequence of the yoga poses we want the class to run.

TunableList.name: instructor_mat_tags
TunableList.description: The instructor's yoga mat tags.

TunableList.name: member_mat_tags
TunableList.description: The class memeber's yoga mat tags.

TunableTuple.name: member_situation_job_test
TunableTuple.description: The situation job test to determine whether npc sim should be picked as class member.

Tunable.name: negate
Tunable.description: If checked then the test result will be reversed, so it will test to see if they are not in a job or not in role state that has matching tags.

TunableList.name: role_tags
TunableList.description: The participant must have a job that matches the role_tags or have the situation_job.

TunableList.name: situation_jobs
TunableList.description: The participant must have this job in this list or a job that matches the role_tags.

TunableTuple.name: number_of_npc_class_members
TunableTuple.description: The range of how many NPCs will join the class.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableTuple.name: post_class_state
TunableTuple.description: The third situation state. Sims in the class will randomly chatting after the class.

TunableTuple.name: situation_state
TunableTuple.description: Class instructor and class members gathering and socializing for a while.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

Tunable.name: time_out
Tunable.description: How long the post class session will last.

TunableTuple.name: pre_class_state
TunableTuple.description: Information related to the pre class situation state.

TunableTuple.name: situation_state
TunableTuple.description: Pre Class Situation State. The yoga instructor will idle in the yoga leader mat, and class members will join the situation and idle on their mats.

Tunable.name: allow_join_situation
Tunable.description: Whether the situation is allowed to join at this state.

TunableList.name: job_and_role_changes
TunableList.description: A mapping between situation jobs and role states that defines what role states we want to switch to for sims on which jobs when this situation state is entered.

Tunable.name: Role State
Tunable.description: The role state that we will switch sims of the linked job into.

Tunable.name: Situation Job
Tunable.description: A reference to a SituationJob that we will use to change sim's role state.

TunableVariant.name: time_out
TunableVariant.description: How long this state will last before time expired. Please talk to the GPE who implemented the specific situation to see what the state will do on time expired.

Tunable.name: time_out
Tunable.description: How long the pre class session will last.
